channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine authorities order mass evacuations from around devastated Kupiansk
Experts raise red flags after noticing dangerous trend contributing to house fires: 'Don't leave them … unattended or overnight'
Man gains access to girlfriend inside Okla. Co. Detention Center after allegedly posing as an attorney
Masked fighters seen executing men in Gaza City as Hamas fights with rival groups
Residents uncover government workers engaging in illegal scheme: 'We asked why they were doing this'
Storm decimates 2 Alaskan villages and drives more than 1,500 people from their homes
item.description: Officials in Alaska are rushing to find housing for people from tiny coastal villages devastated by the remnants of Typhoon Halong

item.title: Social Security cost-of-living increase announcement delayed by government shutdown
item.description: The ongoing government shutdown has delayed the announcement of the annual Social Security cost-of-living increase
